action.action-desc: Mr. Rouzer (for himself and Mr. Graves) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to require Amtrak to include information on base pay and bonus compensation of certain Amtrak executives, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Amtrak Executive Bonus Disclosure Act.
